item.title: Bikes abandoned, 22nd October
item.description:
Been there years. Reported many times, but Lambeth clearly refusing to shift them. Not sure why, as you would think they would want to encourage cycling and providing secure bike locking. Unusbale as they are. Pub about to reopen. Needs sorting, a real mess.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 255, Gipsy Hill, London

item.title: Lamp post not working, 22nd October
item.description:
The lampost adjacent to Millfield green space is not working. That immediate area is very dark and could cause a problem to pedestrians, either tripping or from attack. Still not fix, need fixing soon as, as there is no lighting in that area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iron Mill Lane, Crayford, London
